Package org.mitre.synthea.export.rif.enrollment

Class ContractHistory<T extends FixedLengthIdentifier>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mitre.synthea.export.rif.enrollment.ContractHistory<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PartCContractHistory, PartDContractHistory
    public abstract class ContractHistory<T extends FixedLengthIdentifier>
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class to manage a beneficiary's contract history.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  ContractHistory.ContractPeriod
      Utility class that represents a period of time and an associated contract id.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ContractHistory

        public ContractHistory​(Person person,
                       long stopTime,
                       int yearsOfHistory,
                       int percentChangeOpenEnrollment,
                       int percentChangeMidYear)
        Create a new random contract history.
        Parameters:
        person - source of randomness
        stopTime - when the history should end (as ms since epoch)
        yearsOfHistory - how many years should be covered
        percentChangeOpenEnrollment - percent chance contract will change at open enrollment
        percentChangeMidYear - percent chance contract will change mid year

    • Method Detail

      • getContractID

        public T getContractID​(long timeStamp)
        Get the contract ID for the specified point in time.
        Parameters:
        timeStamp - the point in time
        Returns:
        the contract ID or null if not enrolled at the specified point in time

        Returns:

      • getCoveredMonthsCount

        public int getCoveredMonthsCount​(int year)
        Get a count of months that were covered by Part D in the specified year.
        Parameters:
        year - the year
        Returns:
        the count

      • getRandomContractID

        protected abstract T getRandomContractID​(RandomNumberGenerator rand)
        Get a random contract ID or null if bene is not enrolled. Implementations of this method should use rand to model the likelihood of a bene being enrolled.
        Parameters:
        rand - source of randomness
        Returns:
        a contract ID or null

      • getRandomPlanBenefitPackageID

        protected PlanBenefitPackageID getRandomPlanBenefitPackageID​(RandomNumberGenerator rand,
                                                             T contractID)
        Get a random plan benefit package ID or null if the supplied contract ID is null.
        Parameters:
        rand - a source of randomness
        contractID - the contract ID
        Returns:
        a random plan benefit package ID
